titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny a deduction for image advertising expenses for any trade or business the gross receipts of which exceed $100 million.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/26/2010--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny business taxpayers whose gross receipts exceeded $100 million in the preceding taxable year a tax deduction for expenses incurred for advertising anything other than a service or product.
